definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: engraving ;—abs. ´[[פ]] 2Ch 2:13; sf. [[פִּתֻּחָהּ]] Zec 3:9; elsewhere pl. [[פִּתּוּחִים]] 2Ch 2:6, etc.;—on (wood overlaid with) metal, [[פִּתּוּחֵי]] [[כְּרוּבִים]] 1Ki 6:29 (see v:1Ki 6:21, v:1Ki 6:22), in temple, so Ps 74:6; on stone Zec 3:9, esp. [[פִּתּוּחֵי חׂתָם]] Ex 28:11, Ex 28:21, Ex 28:36, Ex 39:6, Ex 39:14, Ex 39:30; in gen. 2Ch 2:6, 2Ch 2:13.
